base_fields = {'applicants': <django.forms.models.ModelMultipleChoiceField object>, 'date_start': <django.forms.fields.DateField object>, 'funding': <django.forms.models.ModelMultipleChoiceField object>, 'funding_details': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'funding_name': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'other_applicants': <django.forms.fields.BooleanField object>, 'other_stakeholders': <django.forms.fields.BooleanField object>, 'pre_assessment_pdf': <django.forms.fields.FileField object>, 'relation': <django.forms.models.ModelChoiceField object>, 'stakeholders': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'summary': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'supervisor': <django.forms.models.ModelChoiceField object>, 'title': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>}¶
clean()[source]¶

Check for conditional requirements: - If relation needs supervisor, make sure supervisor is set - If other_applicants is checked, make sure applicants are set - If other_stakeholders is checked, make sure stakeholders is not empty - Maximum number of words for summary

base_fields = {'studies_number': <django.forms.fields.IntegerField object>, 'studies_similar': <django.forms.fields.NullBooleanField object>, 'study_name_1': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'study_name_2': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'study_name_3': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'study_name_4': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'study_name_5': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>}¶
clean()[source]¶

Check for conditional requirements: - If studies_similar is not set, add a required error - If studies_similar is set to False, make sure studies_number is set (and higher than 2) - If studies_number is set, make sure the corresponding name fields are filled.

declared_fields = {'study_name_1': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'study_name_2': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'study_name_3': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'study_name_4': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'study_name_5': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>}¶

Check for conditional requirements: - If metc is checked, make sure institution is set and details are filled out - If metc is not checked, check if is_medical or is_behavioristic is set
